attributes.action: stop all politicians and the media and police forces etc. from using the term 'speed kills', causing accidents kills, not the speed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
More of a Political Correction note. I am fed up with politicians, the media, Police Forces etc. etc. etc. and all those 'lobbiests?' using the term 'speed kills' SPEED DOES NOT KILL, having an accident kills. You can run over a childs head at less than 1mph and kill that child, it's the same at 100mph, so speed does not kill, but the act of an accident kills.
Educate the public that careless driving is the cause of death on our roads, once the public get the brainwashing of this fact into thier heads then perhaps you might help in reducing the number of deaths and minor accidents that occur on our roads. So stop using the term to try and justify the location of supposed speed camera sites and that they combat excessive speed which causes accidents. Save the money we spend on cameras and modern technology to employ more police officers to enforce the law and not just create revenue for the government, local authorities and camera partnerships.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
